18using System.Collections;
19using System.Collections.Generic;
20using UnityEngine;
21
22namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
23{
27 public class MillingCutter : MonoBehaviour
28 {
32 [SerializeField] private GameObject _indicator;
36 [SerializeField] private GameObject _prefab;
37
41 public SteamVR_Action_Boolean actionIndicate = SteamVR_Input.GetAction<SteamVR_Action_Boolean>("instrument", "Indicate");
45 public SteamVR_Action_Boolean actionInteract = SteamVR_Input.GetAction<SteamVR_Action_Boolean>("instrument", "Interact");
46
50 private Interactable interactable;
54 private List<GameObject> _toCombine = new List<GameObject>();
55
59 private void Start()
60 {
61 interactable = GetComponent<Interactable>();
62 }
63
68 void Update()
69 {
70 if (!interactable.attachedToHand) return;
71
72 SteamVR_Input_Sources hand = interactable.attachedToHand.handType;
73
74 if (actionInteract.GetState(hand))
75 {
76 if (_prefab == null) return;
77 Transform attachmentPoint = transform.Find("AttachmentPoint");
78 GameObject hitPoint = Instantiate(_prefab, attachmentPoint.transform.position, _indicator.transform.rotation);
79 hitPoint.transform.localScale = new Vector3(0.15f * 0.05f, 0.15f * 0.05f, 0.15f * 0.05f);
80
81 _toCombine.Add(hitPoint);
82 }
83
84 if (actionInteract.GetLastStateUp(hand))
85 {
86 GameObject combined = new GameObject();
87 List<MeshFilter> meshFilters = new List<MeshFilter>();
88 _toCombine.ForEach(e => meshFilters.Add(e.GetComponent<MeshFilter>()));
89 CombineInstance[] combine = new CombineInstance[meshFilters.Count];
90
91 int i = 0;
92 while (i < meshFilters.Count)
93 {
94 combine[i].mesh = meshFilters[i].sharedMesh;
95 combine[i].transform = meshFilters[i].transform.localToWorldMatrix;
96 meshFilters[i].gameObject.SetActive(false);
97
98 i++;
99 }
100 combined.AddComponent<MeshFilter>();
101 combined.transform.GetComponent<MeshFilter>().mesh = new Mesh();
102 combined.transform.GetComponent<MeshFilter>().mesh.CombineMeshes(combine);
103 combined.transform.gameObject.SetActive(true);
104
105 combined.AddComponent<MeshRenderer>();
106 combined.GetComponent<MeshRenderer>().material = _toCombine[0].GetComponent<MeshRenderer>().material;
107
108 _toCombine.ForEach(e => Destroy(e));
109 _toCombine.Clear();
110
111 GameManager manager = FindObjectOfType<GameManager>();
112 Transform targetParent = manager.loadedPatient.transform;
113 if (targetParent == null) return;
114
115 combined.transform.parent = targetParent;
116 combined.name = "Piezo Mill";
117
118 combined.AddComponent<SphereCollider>().isTrigger = true;
119 manager.GetComponent<CaseController>().AddStep(combined);
120
121 }
122
123 if (actionIndicate.GetStateDown(hand))
124 {
125 _indicator.SetActive(true);
126 }
127
128 if (actionIndicate.GetStateUp(hand))
129 {
130 _indicator.SetActive(false);
131 }
132 }
133 }
134}
